name: LOCO
description:
Build you way accross the map and earn your riches using fully Physicaly simulated vehicles
Steam trains , Diesel trains and Trucks...
Are all avaliable to help deliver a veriety of goods to earn that sweet dolla.

Begin by buying vehicles and build track between supply points to deliver goods and earn your way though multiple powerfull vehicles.

Carry many cargo types with actual weight and physics effecting how your vehicles can perform.
Dont forget to fill up with diesel/ water or find yourself stranded needing a delivery of fuel.
Join your friends through steam MP and enjoy the freedom to build how you want across more than 100 sqKM on land.


Game Features (Most not all)
  • Goods delivery
  • 3 steam trains
  • 4 diesel trains
  • 10+ trailer types
  • 4 Cars + variants
  • Recovery Cranes
  • Drawbridges(various)
  • Placeable Buildings(various)
  • Track laying
  • Saveing
  • Multiplayer
  • Teleport between vehicles
  • Buy Sell Vehicles
  • Dynamic Steam engine Boilers

limited beta Keys avaliable upon request in our discord
https://discord.gg/f9MqfYxrhj
